competencies.name: Operative  wears all of the protective clothing appropriate to the task and conditions
Operative reports all accidents, incidents of damage and/or near misses to the relevant person as soon as possible
competencies.supportingText:
Operative reports all accidents, incidents of damage and/or near misses to the relevant person as soon as possible
  1. What is the organisational procedure for reporting accidents and/or near misses?
  2. What is the organisational procedure for reporting damage?
  3. What do you do if a vehicle undertakes you on the pavement/grass verge and nearly hits a colleague?

competencies.name: Operative always washes hands before eating or drinking
Operative reports any new or specific hazards prior to commencing work  or arising during work
competencies.supportingText:
Operative reports any new or specific hazards prior to commencing work or arising during work
  1. What is the organisational procedure for reporting new hazards arising from work?
  2. When are new hazards likely to arise in your work?

competencies.name: Operative avoids or controls adverse impact of  kerbs, steps, potholes, uneven paving or other trip hazards
Operative conducts visual checks prior to walking forwards where view of ground maybe lost
Operative adapts work methods to suit weather conditions and if they present unacceptable hazard  notifies line manager
competencies.supportingText:
Operative adapts work methods to suit weather conditions and if they present unacceptable hazard notifies line manager
  1. What action should be taken to avoid or control adverse effects of wet or icy ground /floor conditions underfoot?

competencies.name: Operative works in accordance with organisational or manufacturer  operating procedures, method statements or related guidance
Operative follows organisational procedures on the use of personal music equipment and their ear pieces
Operative undertakes all work and loading operations with due regard to the safety and proximity of the public, customers or other third parties
competencies.supportingText:
Operative undertakes all work and loading operations with due regard to the safety and proximity of the public, customers or other third parties:
  1. What is the organisational procedure for ensuring that members of the public or others are kept away from vehicles and machinery?

competencies.name: Operative undertakes a check to ensure that containers they intend to empty do not contain people, animals or other unauthorised items
competencies.supportingText:
Operative undertakes a check to ensure that containers they intend to empty do not contain people, animals or other unauthorised items:
  1. What is the company procedure for checking large containers do not contain children, adults or animals?

competencies.name: Operative does not endanger themselves or others when wheeling or carrying waste to the collection vehicle
Operative returns containers to the collection point and avoids  creating obstructions
Operative cleans up any waste spillages immediately, avoiding direct contact and using equipment provided
competencies.supportingText:
Operative cleans up waste spillages immediately, avoiding direct contact and using equipment provided:
  1. What is the purpose of taking immediate action?
  2. Why should contact with waste be avoided?
  3. What equipment could be used to clean up the waste?

competencies.name: Operative closes doors and gates after use where applicable
Operative complies with all site rules when collecting from sites such as: hospitals, schools, factories, camping and caravan sites
